data.title: Gauhati University B.Ed Admission 2024 â€“ GUBEDCET Merit List
data.meta_description: The online application process for Gauhati University B.Ed Admission has started. Interested students may submit their applications through the official web portal.
data.text:
GUBEDCET Merit List 2024

Candidates who have submitted their online applications for admission into the Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) course at Gauhati University and participated in the B.Ed Common Entrance Test held on 14th July 2024 can download their merit list from the following link. The merit list of the B.Ed Entrance Test was published on 5th August 2024. Admissions into the B.Ed course will be based on this merit list.

Important Links of B.Ed CET Merit List

Gauhati University B.Ed Admission

Gauhati University has issued an official notification regarding the admission of the Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) course for the session 2024-25. As per the official notification, GU will conduct a common entrance test called GUBEDCET to select meritorious students for admission. Students who are eligible as per the notification and willing to get admission in the B.Ed course must submit their online application to participate in the entrance test.

Related: Dibrugarh University B.Ed Admission

GU B.Ed Admission Details

Name of Exam: B.Ed Common Entrance Test, 2024

Name of Programme: Bachelor of Education (B.Ed)

Duration of Programme: 2 Years

Academic Session: 2024-25

Name of University: Gauhati University

Type of Exam: Written Exam (OMR)

Date of Exam: 14th July 2024 (Sunday)

Duration of Exam: 120 Minutes

Eligibility Criteria of GU B.Ed Admission

A candidate may be allowed to appear in the GUBEDCET-2024 provided that he/she has passed the BA/ BSc/ BCom or MA/ MSc/ MCom or equivalent degree programme from a recognized Board/ University with at least 50% marks (or 45% for SC/ST/OBC/PWD).

Application Fee of GUBEDCET

Students have to pay Rs.2000/- (Rupees Two Thousand Only) as an application fee to complete the online application process for the Gauhati University B.Ed Common Entrance Test, 2024.

Mode of Payment: Students need to pay the application fee through an online payment gateway using their ATM card, Internet Banking or UPI. Note that no other mode of payment is accepted.

Note: If there is any bank transaction fee then students have to pay it while paying the application fee.

How to Apply for GU B.Ed Admission?

Students who are eligible as per official notification and willing to submit applications for admission must submit their online applications on the official portal of Gauhati University within the stipulated time. For the ease of our users, we have provided some brief steps to complete the application process and users can refer to the steps listed below as a reference.

Important Dates of GU B.Ed Admission

Important Links of GU B.Ed Admission

B.Ed Common Entrance Test Details

A common entrance test will be conducted to select meritorious candidates for admission into the Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) course under Gauhati University. Below we provided some important information regarding this entrance examination.

No of Questions: 100 Questions

Total Marks: 400 Marks

Type of Questions: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) with 4 Options.

Duration of Test: 2 Hours (120 Minutes)

Medium of Test: The test Booklet and OMR will be in English.

Negative Marking: There will be 4 marks for the correct answer and (-1) for the wrong answer. No negative marks for unanswered questions.

Examination Centres

Candidates will be able to appear in any one of the following GUBEDCET-2024 centres and will have to indicate the same while filling out the online form. A candidate has to select any three exam centres. A candidate will be appointed in any one centre based on the feasibility of a particular centre.

Syllabus and Marks Break-Up
